humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that one left axillary sentinel lymph node was biopsied and found to be negative for tumor (0/1). This indicates that there are no metastatic carcinomas in the sentinel lymph node. Additionally, there is no other information in the report suggesting the presence of metastatic carcinoma in any other regional lymph nodes. Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that one sentinel lymph node was biopsied and found to be negative for tumor (0/1). This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
